text: The cells were transfected for 24 hours and serum starved for 4 hours , and then incubated with 10 microM of Ro-31-8220 for 30 minutes prior to treatment with 10 ng / ml of <extra_id_0> TNFalpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
The supernatant were collected after 2 hours of treatment and SEAP secretion in the medium was measured .
The results shown are the fold change over empty vector + pNF-kappaB-SEAP .
Data shown are mean +/- S.E.M for at least three independent experiments performed in duplicate .
